detail_desc: Long bikini top in fluted, crinkled fabric with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and discreet elastication at the hem. Gathers in the sides and an inner top with an elasticated hem. No fasteners.

Thong body in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a lined gusset with press-studs, and a string back.

Sarong in an airy weave. Size 130x150 cm.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.

Track top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, half-zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. Reflective details.The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sports top in fast-drying functional jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, low dropped shoulders, cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, low dropped shoulders, cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short wrapover skirt in airy chiffon with draping. High waist with pleats, concealed press-studs and a belt with metal D-rings. Lined.
Jacket in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud. Unlined.
